column4: i downloaded opera for linux as a tar.gz file . how do i nstall it
why not get the ubuntu deb?
don't know where to get it didn't see it

open up a fresh terminal and copy and paste the following, wget ftp://ftp.130th.net/pub/mirror/opera/linux/910/final/en/i386/shared/opera_9.10-20061214.6-shared-qt_en_i386.deb && sudo dpkg -i opera_9.10-20061214.6-shared-qt_en_i386.deb
the entire thing after the comma, all on one line
